channel.title: About the Projects category
channel.description:
Discussions about all the projects built on the Radix Network.
**Only users in the *Creators* group can create threads in this category and its subcategories**. If you're interested in listing a project, apply for entry in the group [here](https://radixtalk.com/g/Creators). If you're looking to list your NFT, check out [this thread.](https://radixtalk.com/t/how-to-get-your-nft-added-on-radixtalk/267)

item.title: About the Projects category
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Discussions about all the projects built on the Radix Network.

Only users in the Creators group can create threads in this category and its subcategories. If you’re interested in listing a project, apply for entry in the group here.
If you’re looking to list your NFT, check out this thread.

Read full topic
